english.segment1: Verse 1. Jesus keep me near the cross, there's a precious fountain;. free to all a healing stream, flows from Calvary's mountain.
english.segment2: Verse 2. Near the cross I watch and wait, hoping and trusting ever;. 'til I reach that golden strand, it's just beyond the river.
english.segment3: Chorus 1. In the cross, in the cross be my glory ever;. 'til my raptured soul shall find, one of these days I will find rest, rest beyond the river.
english.segment4: Chorus 2. In the cross, in the cross be my glory ever;. 'til my raptured, til my raptured soul shall find. rest beyond the river.
english.segment5: Vamp 1. He'll give me wonderful rest. He'll give me sanctified rest. He'll give me glorious rest. He'll give me everlasting rest.
